content: **size** one size **measurements** depth 26 25 cm / 10 5 length 142 cm / 56 **materials** 1 skein of soft alpaca color 11 a 1 skein of friends kid silk color 67 b circular needle 3 75 mm 40 cm /us 5 16 scissors tapestry needle removable stitch markers optional **yarn quality** soft alpaca hobbii 100% alpaca 50 g / 1 76 oz = 165 m / 180 yds friends kid silk hobbii 72% mohair 25% silk 3% wool 25 g / 0 88 oz = 200 m / 218 yds **gauge** 20 sts x 28 row = 10 cm x 10 cm / 4 x 4 in stockinette stitch pattern with both yarns held together **pattern information** frosted violets is a skinny shawlette knit in stockinette stitch worked from point to point beginning with a few cast-on stitches increases are made along the right side edge every four row until the correct depth of the shawlette is achieved then decreases are made along the same edge until the shawlette is complete the pattern alternates eight row of soft alpaca and kid silk held together with a two-row skinny stripe in just kid silk the first and last stitches of every row are worked in garter stitch this pattern is beginner friendly note this pattern uses nearly all of both skeins if you think you might like to make this larger be sure to prepare ahead of time by acquiring extra skeins **find the pattern in more languages here ** german 1 danish 2 swedish 3 norwegian 4 finnish 5 french 6 spanish 7
